Reviews are the word-of-mouth advertising of the digital age. 79% of consumers report trusting online reviews as much as they trust personal recommendations from a friend or family member. This means that reviews are important! Luckily, Justia allows both peer reviews from other attorneys and reviews from your clients in our directory.

Client Reviews

Requesting client reviews is one of the best ways to showcase your professional services for future clients. Don’t worry – we only permit reviews from actual clients.

Read More ›

Lawyer Reviews

Any lawyer with a verified Justia Profile can leave you a review if they are familiar with your work. Requesting these reviews is easy with a simple email invite.

Read More ›

Lawyer Ratings

Lawyers receive our Justia Lawyer Ratings Badge based on their performance in peer reviews. This badge displays on your Justia Profile and can be used on your website and in your marketing materials!

Learn More ›
